content.body: As discussed last year, here is finally a poll if we want to pick a different timeslot. Doodle only let me select 10 possible options, so I went with this other website instead: https://tallycal.com/p/1479200-1/
Do we want to meet today at the old time?
I _think_ it will use your local timezone, but be careful just in case it's using mine
content.formatted_body: I think it will use your local timezone, but be careful just in case it's using mine

content.body:
> <@nicolo-ribaudo:matrix.org> I _think_ it will use your local timezone, but be careful just in case it's using mine

It appears to have detected mine (it cites "Amsterdam")
content.formatted_body:
In reply to @nicolo-ribaudo:matrix.org
I think it will use your local timezone, but be careful just in case it's using mine
